problem_names: lemma closedD: "\<lbrakk> closed A f; x\<in>A; y\<in>A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<in> A"

lemma order_trans: "\<lbrakk> order r A;  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y;  y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>  x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> z \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z"
lemma order_antisym: "\<lbrakk> order r A; x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> A \<Longrightarrow>  x = y"
lemma order_refl [simp, intro]: "order r A \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow>  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x"

lemma semilat_Def:
"semilat(A,r,f) \<longleftrightarrow> order r A \<and> closed A f \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y) \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y) \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. \<forall>z\<in>A. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<and> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z)"
lemma (in Semilat) orderI [simp, intro]: "order r A"
lemma (in Semilat) refl_r [intro, simp]: "x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x"
lemma (in Semilat) antisym_r [intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x\<in>A \<Longrightarrow>y\<in>A \<Longrightarrow>x = y"

lemma (in Semilat) lub [simp, intro?]:
  "\<lbrakk> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z; x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z"
lemma (in Semilat) ub2 [simp, intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y"
lemma (in Semilat) closedI [simp, intro]: "closed A f"
lemma (in Semilat) closed_f [simp, intro]: "\<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>  \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<in> A"
lemma (in Semilat) ub1 [simp, intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y"

lemma (in Semilat) le_iff_plus_unchanged:
  assumes "x \<in> A" and "y \<in> A"
  shows "x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y \<longleftrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y = y" (is "?P \<longleftrightarrow> ?Q")

lemma (in Semilat) plus_le_conv :
  "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z) = (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<and> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z)"
translations: lemma closedD: "\<lbrakk> closed A f; x\<in>A; y\<in>A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<in> A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>closed A f; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y \<in> A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>closed A f; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y \<in> A
by (unfold closed_def) blast

lemma order_trans: "\<lbrakk> order r A;  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y;  y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow>  x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> z \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z"
by (unfold order_def) blast
lemma order_antisym: "\<lbrakk> order r A; x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> y \<in> A \<Longrightarrow>  x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>order r A; x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x = y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>order r A; x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x = y
by (unfold order_def) ( simp (no_asm_simp))
lemma order_refl [simp, intro]: "order r A \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow>  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>order r A; x \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>order r A; x \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x
by (unfold order_def) (simp (no_asm_simp))

locale Semilat =
  fixes A :: "'a set"
  fixes r :: "'a ord"
  fixes f :: "'a binop"
  assumes semilat: "semilat (A, r, f)"

lemma semilat_Def:
"semilat(A,r,f) \<longleftrightarrow> order r A \<and> closed A f \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y) \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y) \<and> 
                 (\<forall>x\<in>A. \<forall>y\<in>A. \<forall>z\<in>A. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<and> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. semilat (A, r, f) =
    (order r A \<and>
     closed A f \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
       \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
       \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            \<forall>z\<in>A.
               x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<and>
               y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
               x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
               \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. semilat (A, r, f) =
    (order r A \<and>
     closed A f \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
       \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
       \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y) \<and>
     (\<forall>x\<in>A.
         \<forall>y\<in>A.
            \<forall>z\<in>A.
               x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<and>
               y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<longrightarrow>
               x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
               \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z))
by (unfold semilat_def) clarsimp
lemma (in Semilat) orderI [simp, intro]: "order r A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. order r A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. order r A
using semilat

proof (prove)
using this:
  semilat (A, r, f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. order r A
by (simp add: semilat_Def)
lemma (in Semilat) refl_r [intro, simp]: "x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x
by auto
lemma (in Semilat) antisym_r [intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x\<in>A \<Longrightarrow>y\<in>A \<Longrightarrow>x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x = y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x; x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x = y
by (rule order_antisym) auto

lemma (in Semilat) lub [simp, intro?]:
  "\<lbrakk> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z; y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z; x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z; x \<in> A; y \<in> A;
     z \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
                      \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z;
     y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z; x \<in> A; y \<in> A;
     z \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
                      \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z
by (insert semilat) (unfold semilat_Def, simp)
lemma (in Semilat) ub2 [simp, intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
                 \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
                 \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
by (insert semilat) (unfold semilat_Def, simp)
lemma (in Semilat) closedI [simp, intro]: "closed A f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. closed A f

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. closed A f
using semilat

proof (prove)
using this:
  semilat (A, r, f)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. closed A f
by (simp add: semilat_Def)
lemma (in Semilat) closed_f [simp, intro]: "\<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>  \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<in> A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y \<in> A

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y \<in> A
by (simp add: closedD [OF closedI])
lemma (in Semilat) ub1 [simp, intro?]: "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
                 \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x 
                 \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
by (insert semilat) (unfold semilat_Def, simp)

lemma (in Semilat) le_iff_plus_unchanged:
  assumes "x \<in> A" and "y \<in> A"
  shows "x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r y \<longleftrightarrow> x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y = y" (is "?P \<longleftrightarrow> ?Q")

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y) =
    (x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y) =
    (x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y)
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y
 2. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
assume ?P

proof (state)
this:
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y
 2. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
with assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> A
  y \<in> A
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
show ?Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> A
  y \<in> A
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y
by (blast intro: antisym_r lub ub2)

proof (state)
this:
  x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
assume ?Q

proof (state)
this:
  x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y
have "y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> A
  y \<in> A
have "x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> A
  y \<in> A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y = y \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
show ?P

proof (prove)
using this:
  y = x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma (in Semilat) plus_le_conv :
  "\<lbrakk> x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (x \<squnion>\<^sub>f y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z) = (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z \<and> y \<sqsubseteq>\<^sub>r z)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
                       \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z) =
                      (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<and>
                       y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> A; y \<in> A; z \<in> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (x \<squnion>\<^bsub>f\<^esub> y 
                       \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z) =
                      (x \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z \<and>
                       y \<sqsubseteq>\<^bsub>r\<^esub> z)
by (blast intro: ub1 ub2 lub order_trans)
end
